name: Andrélon Classic perfecte krul
composition: ‎Ingrediënten: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Sodium Chloride, Glycerin, Dimethiconol, Parfum, Sodium Benzoate, Glycol Distearate, Carbomer, Citric Acid, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, TEA-Dodecylbenzenesulfonate, TEA-Sulfate, Cocamide MEA, Disodium EDTA, PEG-45M, Phenoxyethanol, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Paraffinum Liquidum, PPG-6, Sodium Hydroxide, Mica, Benzyl Alcohol, Benzyl Salicylate, Hexyl Cinnamal, Limonene, CI 77891.
